name: BTanx Nano
description:
BTanx Nano is a top-down 2D arcade game created specially for the GBJAM 8 (https://itch.io/jam/gbjam-8)

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys - move 
  • P or Shift - push block
  • L or Ctrl - shoot

BTanx Nano

You're controlling small tank that has to reach control point, protect the generator or destroy all enemy's units. You can destroy enemies by shooting them (with bullets that bounce from walls) or pushing block on them.

There are 4 enemy types and 26 levels with hidden passages. Every 5 levels you'll get a password.

Game was made in 2 weekends using Godot, GIMP, Bfxr and Audacity.

Game is available in:

  • HTML - you can play directly on this site (but there are no particle effects for some reason)
  • Windows, Linux or OSX download (Full featured game)

Game is specially made to imitate Game Boy's limitations:

  • 160 x 144 px resolution (upscaled to 640 x 576 px)
  • 4 color palette
